author: husted
msg: Port Struts EL readme into documentation.

author: husted
msg: Extend getLookupNameMethod from getMethod so that class is easier to extend, per #22847.

author: craigmcc
msg: Use the "delegate to a named command" design pattern for validation failures
like we do for exception handling, instead of a conditionally executed

author: craigmcc
msg: Add an exception catcher early in the standard command chain that implements
the usual Struts 1.1 behavior (calling an ExceptionHandler and optionally
forwarding based on the result).  This necessitated a modification to the
API of the postprocess() method in org.apache.commons.chain.Filter, so you'll
need to refresh your version of commons-chain to 20030901 or later as well.
